title: Riot sound team when you work on Gangplank and any new sounds for him
body:
Please do not change the sound of his gun going off. 

It may possibly be the most satisfying sound in the game to hear as you get a kill with it. It just fits perfectly as the sound of a hand sized anti-material rifle, that gangplank just so happens to disguise as flintlock pistol.

replies.body: but you are free to change his new ult sound who is too jerky atm :p
I agree, it's a very satisfying sound. Just like Garen's ultimate sound vocal + metallic clank.
